response.overview: Identical Twins Philip and Ronald lived with their grandparents on an unassuming road in the historic county of Middlesex. It was the summer of 1982. It seemed like a normal sunny day, a slight breeze flew through the air. For 13-year-olds Philip and Ronald, this seemingly normal day would be the beginning of a lifetime search for the truth. For centuries, people on earth have experienced a troubling and persistent phenomenon. There is a belief that they are being taken by aliens from outer space or another dimension. Many people have vivid memories of being abducted secretly against their will by seemingly non-human entities and undergoing complex psychological and physical experiments. The common misconception is that space is a quiet and desolate vacuum of emptiness. A vast expanse of nothingness exists between stars and planets. Space is, however, very active. Signals travel throughout the cosmos, broadcasting their presence to anyone who will listen. This is... Alien Contact.
response.title: Alien Contact: The Biological Connection
